#summary Data types used in the .m3 files.

= Introduction =

The data types used in the references are documented here.


= Details =

===Primitives===
|| CHAR || _char_ ||
|| U32  || _uint32_t_ ||
|| U16  || _uint16_t_ ||
|| I32  || _int32_t_ ||
|| I16  || _int16_t_ ||
|| U8   || _uint8_t_ ||
|| I8   || _int18_t_ ||
|| REAL || _float_ ||

|| [MD33] || _File header_ || 11 ||
|| [MODL] || _Model header_ || 20, 23 ||
|| [SEQS] || _Sequence_ || 1 ||
|| [EVNT] || _Event_ || 0 ||
|| [VEC2] || _Vec2D_ || 0 ||
|| [VEC3] || _Vec3D_ || 0 ||
|| [VEC4] || _Vec4D_ ||
|| [QUAT] || _Quaternion_ ||
|| [BONE] || _Bone_ || 1 ||
|| [ATT]  || _Attachment_ ||
|| [MAT]  || _Material_ || 15 ||
|| [LAYR] || _Texture_ || 20 ||
|| [BNDS] || _Bounding extents_ ||
|| [SD SDEV] || _Sequence data - EVNT_ || 0 ||
|| [SD SDMB] || _Sequence data - BNDS_ ||
|| [SD SD2V] || _Sequence data - VEC2_ || 0 ||
|| [SD SD3V] || _Sequence data - VEC3_ ||
|| [SD SD4Q] || _Sequence data - QUAT_ ||
|| [SD SD3R] || _Sequence data - REAL_ ||
|| [SD SDFG] || _Sequence data - FLAG_ ||
|| [SD SDS6] || _Sequence data - I16_ ||
|| [CAM]  || _Camera_ ||
|| [DIV]  || _Geoset_ || 2 ||
